amendatorysection.catchline: Ground water conservation districts; dissolved; assets distributed; sections; termination date.
amendatorysection.para: Within ninety days after January 1, 1997, all ground water conservation districts created under the Ground Water Conservation Act of Nebraska and in existence on such date shall be dissolved and the assets distributed as provided in section 46-633. Sections 46-614 to 46-632 and 46-634 shall terminate on April 1, 1997.
